attributes.additional_details:
Many thousands of women, mostly above the age of seventy are paid a pension of about £60pw.These are those that have been unable to work having had the duty to raise their children,many during World War 2 and being wives of HM Forces.The reward of £60pw
pension is an insult.The new predicted higher rate pension will not be paid to afore mentioned,so it is time for this Government to remove this injustice,and introduce Fairness for these women .
